pullrequest.title: Fix detection of XML parsing errors

content.raw:
That error typically means that you've omitted the closing tag like `</sdf>`, but I agree the error messages aren't that helpful.

I looked into getting better messages briefly, but I wasn't able to figure it out either.
content.html:
That error typically means that you've omitted the closing tag like </sdf>, but I agree the error messages aren't that helpful.

I looked into getting better messages briefly, but I wasn't able to figure it out either.
